Product Title: Folie for Women EDP - Eau De Parfum 100ml(3.4 oz) | Saffron, Red Fruits, Hedione, Jasmine, Moss, Amber | Perfume, Perfumes for women, Women's fragrances, Fragrance, Womens perfume | by Intense Elite

Product Details: {'Brand': 'INTENSE ELITE', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 3.39 x 3.35 inches; 3.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: The box is not as bougie as the other ones from this brand presentation wise. The scent is very strong. One squirt a day type strong. The best way to describe this in my opinion is floral /woodsy. I don’t have the most educated nose though. The bottle is beautiful. Very nice but not my favorite from this brand.
Review Title: Smells very floral
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Wavertree & London Pineapple, Coconut & Lime (1 Bar) Simple Scents Australia ['Australian Soapworks Wavertree & London 200g Soap - Pineapple, Coconut & Limeis produced in Australia by dedicated artisan soap makers using the traditional French Milling process. The soaps are wrapped in embossed paper and enriched with pure Organic Shea Butter.Tropical ingredients rejuvenate sun-damaged skin, improving overall skin texture. Lime invigorates the lungs, vitamin C encourages collagen renewal, and coconut fortifies skin and seals in moisture.'] {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Simple Scents Australia', 'Scent': 'Coconut,Pineapple,Lime', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.5 x 0.8 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B010C79OCA_US', 'Manufacturer': 'Simple Scents Australia'} Smells so much better than expected! I got the beach scent for Christmas and liked the quality lathering 🧼 so I was curious to try this one and it smells like just like the Sandals Resorts lotions/soaps which is very lemongrass like. Super pleased. Love the brand and the shipping was super fast. So pleased with the smell and quick delivery [Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes Fugacal {'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'} I was very nervous to try this steaming straightener brush. The directions are very thorough so I felt confident. There are a lot of warnings about this product so make sure you read the instructions carefully. Once I did a few hair sections it felt like I had been doing it for years and all my fears were gone. I did not burn myself and my hair came out super smooth and pretty. It’s easy to do a little curl at the end if you rotate your wrist outwards which I like. I would recommend this product! Quick shipping and great packaging I am impressed! INGRINC Lying Silkworm Eyeliner Pen Shiny Matte Rotatable Highlighter Makeup Eyeshadow Pencil Brighten Bottom-Eyelid Silkworm Makeup Eyeshadow Eyeliner Pen for Women Girls (2,3,5) INGRINC ['1'] {'Color': '2,3,5', 'Brand': 'INGRINC', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1'} Instead of getting #1 I think I got #2 according to the boxes. Ironically number two was the only one that was smooth when applying and the other ones were so dry I couldn’t get any color from them! I attached a picture showing that only a few sparkles managed to stick onto my left eye area. It looks sad.
My right eye was the one I used number two on and it looks better than the other eye but still not great. I imagine if I were to have gotten the correct pen (#1) it would have been just as dry as the other two because it was a glittery one like the #3 & #5…. In my opinion this is not worth the money and I do not recommend. Only one pen was semi good Folie for Women EDP - Eau De Parfum 100ml(3.4 oz) | Saffron, Red Fruits, Hedione, Jasmine, Moss, Amber | Perfume, Perfumes for women, Women's fragrances, Fragrance, Womens perfume | by Intense Elite INTENSE ELITE {'Brand': 'INTENSE ELITE', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 3.39 x 3.35 inches; 3.4 Ounces'} The box is not as bougie as the other ones from this brand presentation wise. The scent is very strong. One squirt a day type strong. The best way to describe this in my opinion is floral /woodsy. I don’t have the most educated nose though. The bottle is beautiful. Very nice but not my favorite from this brand. Smells very floral
profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality personal care products that evoke a beach or vacation ambiance, particularly favoring tropical and refreshing scents like coconut, pineapple, and lime. They prioritize rejuvenating and moisturizing fragrances, with effective lathering performance being key. Their recent exploration of functional hair care tools reflects a growing confidence in innovative grooming technologies.

A recent purchase revealed the user’s evolving awareness of quality in cosmetic products, leading to a more discerning perspective on fragrances. While they appreciate beautiful packaging and the allure of strong scents, they are also critical of less impressive product presentations. This interaction highlights their appreciation for craftsmanship and efficacy, aligning with their ongoing focus on reliable service, quick shipping, and excellent packaging.

Overall, the user values sensory-rich experiences and natural ingredients in their wellness and beauty routines. They consistently choose artisan and organic brands, emphasizing effective skincare and hair care solutions. Their feedback demonstrates a commitment to enjoying each product while acknowledging the importance of performance. This latest experience reinforces their critical perspective on fragrance selection within their established preferences for quality and user satisfaction.
